data.name: CalWiz0
data.value: Welcome to the head tracker calibration wizard! To calibrate, simply place your tracker in the position shown in each picture, and click next. Click next now to discard your existing calibration and get started.

data.name: CalWiz1
data.value: Place the tracker as shown in the picture. The IMU components should face up, and the USB cable should be to the left. Once positioned, hold tracker very still and click next.

data.name: CalWiz2
data.value: Turn the tracker 180 degrees. The IMU components should face up, and the USB cable should be to the right. Click next once positioned.

data.name: CalWiz3
data.value: With the USB cable on the left, tilt the tracker forward 90 degrees from level so that the IMU components are facing away from you. Click next once positioned.

data.name: CalWiz4
data.value: With the USB cable on the left, tilt the tracker backward 90 degrees from level so that the IMU components are facing toward you. Click next once positioned.

data.name: CalWiz5
data.value: Roll the tracker to the right 90 degrees from level, so that the IMU components are facing to your right, and the USB cable is on the top. Click next once positioned.

data.name: CalWiz6
data.value: Roll the tracker to the left 90 degrees from level, so that the IMU components are facing to your left, and the USB cable is on the bottom. Click next once positioned.

data.name: CalWiz7
data.value: With the USB cable on the left, turn the tracker upside down so that the IMU components are facing down. Click next once positioned.

data.name: CalWiz8
data.value: You are now ready to store the calibration offsets. Click next to store the results to the tracker.

data.name: CalWiz9
data.value: Calibration complete!

data.name: CalWizTracking0
data.value: Welcome to the head tracker calibration wizard! During calibration, you will slowly and smoothely rotate the tracker in a full 360 circle around the specified axis. Click next now to discard your existing calibration and get started.

data.name: CalWizTracking1
data.value: Start by placing the tracker down on a table with the IMU components facing up as shown in the picture. Hold the tracker still, then press next.

data.name: CalWizTracking2
data.value: Now slowly and steadily rotate the tracker in a full 360 degree circle around the pan axis, as shown. When complete, press next.

data.name: CalWizTracking3
data.value: Now slowly and steadily rotate the tracker in a full 360 degree circle around the tilt axis, as shown. When complete, press next.

data.name: CalWizTracking4
data.value: Now slowly and steadily rotate the tracker in a full 360 degree circle around the roll axis, as shown. When complete, press next.

data.name: CalWizTracking5
data.value: You are now ready to store the calibration offsets. Click next to store the results to the tracker.

data.name: CalWizTracking6
data.value: Calibration complete!
